#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Perur Santhalinga Swamigal
#Text=Santhalinga Swamigal ( Santhalingam )
#Text=was a Saiva spiritual writer in Perur , known as West-Chidambaram , Tamil Nadu .
#Text=Santhalinga swamigal was born to a Tamil-speaking family .
#Text=That village is called Perur in Tamil Nadu , South India into an orthodox
#Text=Saiva
#Text=Tamil family around the middle of the 17th century .
#Text=Early life
#Text=St. Santhalingar lived in Perur three hundred years ago .
#Text=Perur is known as Chidambaram west . ( The chidambaram East is in South Arcot Dt . )
#Text=It is believed that he should have been born either in the " Nadu Nadu " or " Thondai Nadu " where the ' Vira Saiva ' religion , was popular .
#Text=From his very childhood he developed love to serve Lord Siva ascetics , to respect and revere the symbols of Siva , namely Vibuthi and Rudraksha .
#Text=His company with holy people inducted him to perceive the vanity of the worldly things .
#Text=He abhorred the idea of birth and rebirth .
#Text=He under took a pilgrimage to all the holy cities where Lord Siva reigns supreme in search of a Guru who could initiate him in this birth ridding process . [ 1 ]
#Text=Perur village

#Text=Perur is sacred not only because it is one of the ' sivasthalams ' of Kongunadu , but also because the Divine grace of Lord Siva is so immanent and perceptible that when Sundaramoorthy Nayanar , one of the four preceptors of Saivism , went to chidambaram to worship Lord Nataraja , he found there but the deity of Perur .
#Text=He stays in this Thillaikkoil hymn .
#Text=Hence it is no wonder that our St. Santhalinga Swamigal was also attracted by this holy city . [ 2 ]
#Text=Siva prakasar and Santhalinga Swamigal
#Text=Sri-la-Sri .
#Text=Sivagnana Balaya Swamigal II , the Head of the Bommaiya Adheenami was his contemporary , whose miraculous feats and wealth of -Sivagnanam- possessed wide popularity .

#Text=St. Santhalinga Swamigal desired to see him , During his sojourn there , he got the acquaintance of Thuraimangalam Sivaprakasa Swamigal , a great seer , a Virasaiva saint , scholar and poet at Thiruvannamalai .
#Text=St. Santhalinga Swamigal enjoyed the company of Siva Prakasar .
#Text=Along with him , he went and stayed at Bommaiyapuram
#Text=Gnambikai Ammal and Santhalinga Swamigal
#Text=With the blessings of St Sivagnana Balaysswamigal .
#Text=St. Santhalingaswamigal married Gnanambikai
#Text=She is the sister of Siva prakasa Swamigal , Velaiyar and Karunai Prakasar .
#Text=His family life was in conformity with the maxim " If a man fulfilled aright the duties of the house-holder , where is the need for him to take up other duties ?
